name: Trooper
description: The basic infantry unit of the Empire. Troopers compose the bulk of the Imperial Army's front-line forces. What these fresh recruits lack in experience and survivability, they make up for with complete devotion to the Emperor.

actions.name: Battle Rifle
actions.description: Standard attack with the M-11 Battle Rifle

actions.name: Double Shot
actions.description: Fire two shots in quick succession with reduced accuracy

name: Shock Trooper
description: A premium infantry soldier with comparatively high HP, Defense, and Dodge for an early unit, enabling quick promotion at low cost.

actions.name: Burst Fire
actions.description: Short-range burst fire attack

actions.name: Controlled Burst
actions.description: More accurate burst fire with higher critical chance

name: Grenadier
description: A soldier unit dealing Explosive damage with its Grenade and uses Indirect fire to target enemies in the second or third row.

actions.name: Small Grenade
actions.description: Throws a grenade that deals area damage

actions.name: Flashbang
actions.description: Throws a flashbang that stuns enemies with 100% stun chance

actions.name: Incendiary Grenade
actions.description: Throws an incendiary grenade that causes fire damage over time

actions.name: Handful of Grenades
actions.description: Launches three separate grenades at the selected center space with chance to deviate

name: Mortar Team
description: The first unit available to the player with area-of-effect damage. Deals explosive damage effective against armored units.

actions.name: Explosive Shell
actions.description: Light Mortar explosive shell attack

actions.name: Frag Shells
actions.description: Light Mortar piercing frag shells

name: Arsonist
description: This soldier LOVES to play with fire! He's whipped together some Molotov Cocktails to turn the heat up on the enemy...

actions.name: Molotov Cocktail
actions.description: Throws a molotov that causes fire damage with 100% burn chance for 3 turns

actions.name: SMG Burst Fire
actions.description: Short-range triple-shot burst fire attack

name: Hunter
description: A soldier unit specializing in ranged attacks with bonuses against Critters and features precise firing capabilities that bypass non-blocking units.

actions.name: Aimed Shot
actions.description: Precise shot with bonus critical chance against Critters and Soldiers

name: Gunner
description: The Gunner has the useful ability to spray fire into a three-block wide target area, and up to two rows deep.

actions.name: Machine Gun
actions.description: Spray fire attack hitting multiple targets

actions.name: Heavy Fire
actions.description: Concentrated fire with 6 hits

actions.name: Anti-Air Spray
actions.description: Anti-air attack with random targeting

name: Sniper
description: Only the most skilled Sharpshooters survive long enough to become full-fledged Snipers. Features extremely high damage and 50% crit chance against soldiers.

actions.name: Scoped Shot
actions.description: High-damage precise shot with 50% crit chance against soldiers

actions.name: Quick Shot
actions.description: Faster shot with lower cooldown

actions.name: Armor Piercing Shot
actions.description: Shot with 50% armor piercing

name: Commando
description: A premium soldier unit with high HP, defense, dodge, and bravery. Features both burst fire and grenade launcher attacks.

actions.name: Bust a Cap
actions.description: Assault rifle burst fire with 3 hits

actions.name: Explosive Shell
actions.description: Grenade launcher explosive shell

name: Juggernaut
description: Super tough (290 HP), mercilessly destructive, and damn near unstoppable. An armored frontline unit with a light machine gun.

actions.name: Burst Fire
actions.description: Light machine gun burst with 3 hits and 15% crit

actions.name: Penetrating Rounds
actions.description: Armor piercing burst with 75% AP and 3 hits

name: Heavy Grenadier
description: A more powerful variant of the standard Grenadier, equipped with a rotary grenade launcher capable of firing multiple grenades simultaneously.

actions.name: Triple Bomb
actions.description: Fires three grenades in sequence

actions.name: X Strike
actions.description: Fires grenades in an X pattern

name: Imperial Dragoon
description: Premium infantry unit with melee multi-target capabilities using an Electro-Lance.

actions.name: Big Swing
actions.description: Sweeping melee attack with electro-lance

actions.name: Stun Sweep
actions.description: Stunning attack with 60% stun chance for 3 turns

name: Junior Officer
description: A soldier armed with a sidearm capable of firing multiple times per turn.
motto: With his Sidearm locked and loaded, this soldier is prepared to fire not once, not twice, but three times per turn.

actions.name: Triple Shot
actions.description: Fires three shots in rapid succession

actions.name: Point Blank
actions.description: Close-range precise shot with 25% crit vs soldiers

name: Riot Trooper
description: First unit with armor stat; serves as early-game defensive unit with shield and shotgun.

actions.name: Buckshot
actions.description: Shotgun blast with 3 hits and bonus crit vs soldiers

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.description: Melee attack with 100% stun chance for 3 turns

name: Sharpshooter
description: Low-level soldier unit and first Sniper class available. Deploys behind front-line units for long-range support.

actions.name: Aimed Shot
actions.description: Precise shot with 35% crit vs soldiers

actions.name: Quick Shot
actions.description: Faster shot with shorter range

name: Heavy Gunner
description: Premium soldier unit offering upgraded capabilities compared to standard Gunner with wider attack patterns.

actions.name: Wide Spray
actions.description: Minigun spray with 4 hits

actions.name: Anti-Air Wide Spray
actions.description: Anti-air minigun spray with 4 hits

name: Saboteur
description: A specialized operative equipped with demolition charges and a silenced pistol. Does not block.

actions.name: Demolitions Charge
actions.description: Explosive C4 with 50% armor piercing, placed behind target

actions.name: Silenced 9mm
actions.description: Silenced pistol with 20% crit

name: Flame Trooper
description: Premium infantry unit specializing in fire damage with a pressurized napalm tank.

actions.name: Spray Flame
actions.description: Flamethrower attack with 25% AP, 60% fire chance for 2 turns

name: Ranger
description: An enhanced variant of the Shock Trooper with superior range, damage output, and health points.

actions.name: Bust a Cap
actions.description: Assault rifle burst with 3 hits

name: Hornet
description: Soldier unit specialized in explosive rocket attacks with anti-air capabilities.
motto: Hornets are known for their ability to kill, and this unit is no different. His sting is lethal.

actions.name: Mini Rocket Volley
actions.description: Fires 4 rockets with random spread

actions.name: Anti-Air Mini Rocket Volley
actions.description: Anti-air rockets with 4 hits

name: Bazooka Squad
description: Highly destructive force effective against tanks and armored vehicles with 75% armor piercing.

actions.name: Bazooka Blast
actions.description: High damage rocket with 75% armor piercing, 10% crit vs vehicles

actions.name: Anti-Air Bazooka Blast
actions.description: Anti-air rocket with 75% AP, 10% crit vs aircraft

name: Marksman
description: Premium sniper unit featuring a .338 Sniper Rifle with three attack options and 50% crit vs soldiers.
motto: This Sniper is the creme de la creme of snipers. He's pretty hard to take down.

actions.name: Scoped Shot
actions.description: Precise shot with 50% crit vs soldiers

actions.name: Quick Shot
actions.description: Faster shot with shorter range

actions.name: Armor Piercing Shot
actions.description: Shot with 50% armor piercing

name: RPG Trooper
description: Single-operator rocket launcher specialist with superior mobility compared to Bazooka Squad, excelling at anti-vehicle combat.
motto: Although the heavy bazooka remains the standard anti-tank weapon for the Imperial Infantry, small numbers of the recently developed rocket propelled grenade launcher are undergoing field tests.

actions.name: Bazooka Blast
actions.description: RPG shot with 75% armor piercing, 15% crit vs vehicles

actions.name: Anti-Air Bazooka Blast
actions.description: Anti-air RPG with 75% AP, 15% crit vs air

name: Demolitionist
description: Soldier equipped with radio-controlled mines for anti-vehicle combat. Does not block.
motto: This soldier loves to see things explode, especially the enemy!

actions.name: Anti-Vehicle Mine
actions.description: Radio-controlled mine with 50% armor piercing

name: Ninja Trooper
description: Elite ninja warrior with katana and shuriken attacks. Fast unit type with prep time abilities.
motto: I'm not sure I'm entirely comfortable hiring killers with flexible loyalties.

actions.name: Flash Strike
actions.description: Katana attack with 3 hits and 2-round prep time

actions.name: Three Stars
actions.description: Shuriken attack with 15% crit vs soldiers, 15% AP

actions.name: Smoke
actions.description: Smoke bomb with 100% stun for 2 turns

actions.name: Explosion
actions.description: Bomb attack with 25% armor piercing

name: Chem Trooper
description: Chemical weapons specialist with poison-based attacks that deal damage over time.

actions.name: Chemical Sweep
actions.description: Chemical spray with 50% AP and 100% poison for 3 turns

name: Cryo Trooper
description: Support unit with freeze ability. Resembles Mr. Freeze from Batman comics. Immune to cold.

actions.name: Frozen Shot
actions.description: Cryogenic rifle with 20% AP and 100% freeze for 3 turns

name: Lightning Trooper
description: Uses forked lightning attacks that penetrate enemy lines and stun targets. Also known as Electro Trooper.
motto: This soldier uses lightning to his advantage. His Forked Shock attack penetrates enemy lines in a forked pattern and stuns them into confusion!

actions.name: Forked Shock
actions.description: Electric rifle with forked pattern, 25% AP, 30% stun for 3 turns, 20% crit vs tanks

name: Armadillo
description: Fortified with an armored shield, this unit is prepared to spray some pain. Spawns a Grenadier on death. No armor while stunned.
motto: Fortified with an armored shield, this unit is prepared to spray some pain. His Submachine Gun blasts bullets at the enemy, though they have to be standing right in front of him.

actions.name: Burst Fire
actions.description: Submachine gun with 3 hits

name: Veteran
description: No stranger to the brutalities of war. Packing Machine Guns and Grenade Launchers, he's ready to fight the good fight.
motto: No stranger to the brutalities of war, this unit is specially outfitted to inflict pain on the enemy.

actions.name: Automatic Fire
actions.description: Machine gun with 3 hits and 65% armor piercing

actions.name: Bullet Spray
actions.description: Area machine gun with 2 hits and 50% AP, 30% crit

actions.name: Anti-Tank Grenade
actions.description: Grenade with 70% AP, 30% crit, can target air

name: Guerrilla
description: A specialist unit dedicated to dealing heavy damage to back-line vehicles and artillery through explosive charges and precision gunfire. Does not block.

actions.name: Demolitions Charge
actions.description: C4 explosive with 60% armor piercing, placed behind target

actions.name: Silenced 9mm
actions.description: Silenced pistol with 30% crit

actions.name: Demolitions Charge (Vehicle)
actions.description: Anti-vehicle C4 with 65% AP, 50% crit vs vehicles, long range

name: Arctic Trooper
description: Bundles up tough to fight the frigid with Machine Gun attacks. Immune to cold and freeze.
motto: This unit straps on snowshoes and bundles up tough to fight the frigid, with Machine Gun and Automatic Fire attacks.

actions.name: Automatic Fire
actions.description: Machine gun with 3 hits and 65% armor piercing

name: Railgun Sniper
description: Premium sniper combining traits of standard snipers and railgun weaponry. While most Snipers have trouble with one headshot, this unit aims for three with a single shot.
motto: While most Snipers have trouble with one headshot, this unit aims for three with a single shot.

actions.name: High Velocity Bolt
actions.description: 100% AP railgun shot hitting 2 targets, 20% crit, 15% crit vs soldiers, 30% crit vs vehicles

name: Elemental Trooper
description: Masters of both Fire and Freeze with heavy armor and versatility. Immune to cold, fire, and freeze.
motto: Element Troopers are masters of both Fire and Freeze. Heavy armor and versatility make them a true force of nature. In battle, they are anything but tepid.

actions.name: Burning Shots
actions.description: Fire pistol with 2 hits and 100% fire DoT for 3 turns

actions.name: Freezing Shots
actions.description: Ice pistol with 2 hits and 100% freeze for 3 turns

actions.name: Flame Barrage
actions.description: Area fire attack with 100% fire DoT for 3 turns, 10% crit

actions.name: Frozen Barrage
actions.description: Area freeze attack with reduced freeze chance, 10% crit

name: The Wimp
description: This unit isn't any good, or is he? You shouldn't judge a book by its cover.

actions.name: Bust a Cap
actions.description: Rifle attack with 3 hits

actions.name: Juiced Clap
actions.description: Powerful crushing attack affecting a column, 50% armor piercing

actions.name: Juiced Hook
actions.description: Powerful crushing attack hitting 3 adjacent front-row spaces, 50% armor piercing

name: Field Agent
description: Armed with numerous tools, making this unit an all-purpose unit.

actions.name: Eliminate
actions.description: High-accuracy pistol shot with 30% critical chance

actions.name: EMP Burst
actions.description: EMP attack that can stun vehicles (55% chance, 3 turns)

actions.name: Nerve Gas
actions.description: Gas attack that can stun soldiers (40% chance, 3 turns)

name: Turtlesheller
description: Turtleshellers despise camping and prefer to see things from the front lines. Their armored shell allows them to maintain resilience as they calculate the arc of their anti-infantry mortar.

actions.name: 90mm Mortar
actions.description: Frag shell mortar with indirect fire

actions.name: AA Frag Shell
actions.description: Anti-air frag shell for air units

actions.name: Armor-Piercing Shell
actions.description: AP shell with 50% armor piercing

actions.name: Bio Shell
actions.description: Poison shell with 100% poison for 3 turns, 50% armor piercing

name: Peace Keeper
description: Infantry unit used mainly as riot control against angry civilians during uprisings in the Southern Frontier.

actions.name: Apprehend
actions.description: Non-lethal capture attack for civilians only

actions.name: Take Down
actions.description: Non-lethal melee attack (cannot reduce HP below 10%)

actions.name: Tear Gas
actions.description: Stun gas with 100% stun chance for 3 turns

actions.name: EMP Grenade
actions.description: Stun grenade for metal units with 100% stun for 3 turns

name: Hitman
description: A premium backstabbing assassin with poison capabilities.

actions.name: Bust a Cap
actions.description: Pistol attack with 3 hits

actions.name: Three Handed Backstab
actions.description: Backstab attack with 2-turn prep time, 45% crit vs soldiers

actions.name: Poisoned Blade
actions.description: Poison attack with 100% poison for 4 turns

name: Salamander
description: This isn't any ordinary Flame Trooper, because this guy is Armored! The enemy better be ready to get crispy.

actions.name: Spray Flame
actions.description: Wide flame attack hitting 3 units, 25% armor piercing, 60% fire DoT for 2 turns

actions.name: Deep Flame
actions.description: Precision flame attack hitting 4 deep, 25% armor piercing, 60% fire DoT for 2 turns

actions.name: Beat Down
actions.description: Melee attack with 25% armor piercing and 100% fire DoT for 3 turns, 20% crit vs soldiers

name: Big Game Hunter
description: A skilled hunter equipped with electric darts and nets, especially effective against critters.

actions.name: AP Electric Dart
actions.description: Electric dart with 70% armor piercing, 50% stun chance for 2 turns, 100% crit vs critters

actions.name: Electrified Net
actions.description: Area effect net with 15% armor piercing, 30% stun for 2 turns, 100% crit vs critters

name: Imperial Peacemonger
description: An enhanced, bulkier version of the Peace Keeper with both lethal and non-lethal capabilities.

actions.name: Incapacitate
actions.description: Electrified baton attack with 25% armor piercing and 100% stun for 2 turns

actions.name: Mustard Gas
actions.description: Poison gas with 100% poison for 3 turns

actions.name: Concussive Canister
actions.description: Stun grenade with 100% stun for 3 turns (cannot reduce HP below 10%)

actions.name: Apprehend
actions.description: Non-lethal capture attack for civilians only

actions.name: Taze
actions.description: Taser attack with 25% armor piercing, 100% stun for 3 turns, 1 turn prep (cannot reduce HP below 10%)

name: Bio Grenadier
description: This unit tosses poison vials right past any debris, rocks, barricades, and front line defenses.

actions.name: Chemical Grenade
actions.description: Poison grenade with 50% armor piercing and 100% poison for 4 turns

name: Lightning Dragoon
description: Very similar to the Lightning Trooper, though with some differences: lower health and a lower damage, plus a reduced stun chance.

actions.name: Bolt Burst
actions.description: Lightning attack with 25% armor piercing and 25% crit vs tanks

actions.name: Stun Burst
actions.description: Lightning attack with 100% stun for 3 turns, uses 2 ammo

name: Scout
description: He's from Boston, solves problems with his fists, and is 'kind of a big deal.' He's quick on his feet.

actions.name: Scatter Shot
actions.description: Shotgun blast with 4 pellets, 15% crit vs soldiers

actions.name: Batter Up
actions.description: Baseball bat swing hitting 3 tiles horizontally

name: Heavy
description: This Russian beast of a man loves sandviches. But above all else, he loves his mini-gun Sasha.

actions.name: Mow Down
actions.description: Mini-gun burst with 4 hits, 20% armor piercing

actions.name: Get In Line
actions.description: Long range mini-gun with 3 hits, 25% armor piercing

actions.name: Anti-Air Bullet Spray
actions.description: Anti-air mini-gun with 3 hits, 30% armor piercing

name: Demoman
description: He has a fierce temper and a fascination with all things that go BOOM!

actions.name: Triple Bomb
actions.description: Grenade launcher with 3 explosive hits

actions.name: Fire Grenade
actions.description: Incendiary grenade with 60% fire DoT for 5 turns, area effect

name: Soldier
description: Using his signature rocket launcher, this would-be-hero-of-war can take out infantry and vehicles with ease!

actions.name: Rocket Attack
actions.description: Rocket launcher with 25% armor piercing and 30% fire DoT for 2 turns, area effect

actions.name: Hand Tossed
actions.description: Grenade with 15% armor piercing

name: Pyro
description: Silent but deadly, this madman (or madwoman) uses a vicious flamethrower to scorch enemies and a flare gun to light them ablaze!

actions.name: Spray Flame
actions.description: Flamethrower with 25% armor piercing and 80% fire DoT for 2 turns, 35% crit vs soldiers, area effect

actions.name: Flare
actions.description: Flare gun with 15% armor piercing and 60% fire DoT for 2 turns, 25% crit, 55% crit vs vehicles, area effect
